candies.name: Nerds
candies.desc: An American candy launched in 1983, under the brand name Willy Wonka Candy Company. Nerds flavors range from Strawberry, Grape, Orange, Watermelon, and Lemonade

candies.name: Snickers
candies.desc: A classic chocolate bar with peanuts, caramel, and nougat, produced by Mars, Inc.

candies.name: Skittles
candies.desc: Colorful fruit-flavored candies produced and marketed by the Wrigley Company (a subsidiary of Mars, Inc.).

candies.name: M&M's
candies.desc: Colorful button-shaped chocolates produced by Mars, Inc.

candies.name: Reese's Peanut Butter Cups
candies.desc: A popular peanut butter and chocolate confection produced by The Hershey Company.

candies.name: ButterFinger
candies.desc: A crispety, crunchety, peanut buttery candy bar made by Ferrero.

candies.name: Gummy Bears
candies.desc: Chewy, fruit-flavored gummy candies loved by kids and adults alike.
